languages.text: "Вигдис, занимайся шаттлами и эвакуацией Лорд-капитана! Я принимаю командование. Всем постам — готовиться к бою!"
"Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"
languages.original_text: "Вигдис, занимайся шаттлами и эвакуацией Лорд-капитана! Я принимаю командование. Всем постам — готовиться к бою!"

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

languages.text: « Vigdis, occupez-vous des navettes et de l'évacuation {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! Je prends le commandement. À toutes les stations, préparez-vous au combat ! »
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

traits.locale_text: « Vigdis, occupez-vous des navettes et de l'évacuation {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! Je prends le commandement. À toutes les stations, préparez-vous au combat ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vigdis, kümmert Euch um die Shuttles und die Evakuierung des Lord Captains! Ich übernehme das Kommando. Alle Stationen gefechtsbereit machen!"
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis, kümmert Euch um die Shuttles und die Evakuierung des Lord Captains! Ich übernehme das Kommando. Alle Stationen gefechtsbereit machen!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Vigdis, ¡encárguese de la evacuación de las lanzaderas y de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Asumiré el mando. A todas las estaciones, ¡preparaos para el combate!».
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

traits.locale_text: «Vigdis, ¡encárguese de la evacuación de las lanzaderas y de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán! Asumiré el mando. A todas las estaciones, ¡preparaos para el combate!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “维格迪斯，你负责处理穿梭机和舰长大人的撤离事宜！我负责指挥。所有船员，准备战斗！”
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

traits.locale_text: “维格迪斯，你负责处理穿梭机和舰长大人的撤离事宜！我负责指挥。所有船员，准备战斗！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴィグディス、シャトルとロード・キャプテンの避難対応をお願いします！指揮は我が執りましょう。全ステーション、戦闘準備を！」
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィグディス、シャトルとロード・キャプテンの避難対応をお願いします！指揮は我が執りましょう。全ステーション、戦闘準備を！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vigdis, mekiklerle ve Lord Kaptan'ın tahliyesiyle ilgilen! Komutayı ben alıyorum. Tüm istasyonlar, savaşa hazırlanın!"
languages.original_text: "Vigdis, deal with the shuttles and the Lord Captain's evacuation! I am taking command. All stations prepare for battle!"
